data.title: INVESTOR ACTION ALERT: The Schall Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Lawsuit Against JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Encourages Investors with Losses in Excess of $100,000 to Contact the Firm
data.text: Los Angeles, California--(Newsfile Corp. - November 9, 2020) -  The Schall Law Firm, a national shareholder rights litigation firm, announces the filing of a class action lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase & Co. ("JP Morgan" or "the Company") (NYSE: JPM) for violations of §§10(b) and 20(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 and Rule 10b-5 promulgated thereunder by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.Investors who purchased the Company's securities between February 23, 2016 and September...
